title: Handle a Payment Plan Change
description: A customer who pays quarterly wants to switch to a monthly payment plan.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their current quarterly payment plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer's account and current billing setup.

tasks.description: Explain the new monthly payment amount, including any installment fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the new, smaller monthly payment amount.

tasks.description: Update the customer's billing plan from quarterly to monthly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the payment plan in the system.
